name: Micky

topics.topic_text: I've got some Aqua Pura, if you want it.
topics.response_text: You mean... you don't want anything for it? I don't have any caps or anything...
You've helped me so much, it seems wrong to ask, but can you spare any more water?
You mean... you don't want anything for it? I don't have any caps or anything...

topics.topic_text: What, just give it to you? Hell no.
topics.response_text: I knew it was too good to be true... there are no good souls in the Wasteland.

topics.topic_text: I insist, my friend. It's the least I can do to help.
topics.response_text: Really? Thank you. You're the first person willing to actually give me any of that.

topics.topic_text: What is this place? Some kind of city?
topics.response_text: It's Megaton. Have you been living in a hole or something? Everyone's heard of Megaton.
Oh... I guess that's understandable. Got to watch out for numero uno and all.
I've been drinking this irradiated shit and... I can't do it. I just throw it up now. I need purified water... please...{Pathetic.}

conversation.response_text: Please... I'm dying. I need water...

description:
Micky is a 22 year-old Caucasian Male.

A young man with haunted eyes and a gaunt appearance, Micky stands outside Megaton's gates, clutching an empty bottle and begging for water. His clothes are tattered, and he has fresh scratches on his arms from his escape from Springvale School.

Micky's Personality: Micky is desperate and fearful, but retains a sliver of hope that someone will show him kindness. He is jumpy and distrustful due to his recent traumatic experience with raiders. Despite his suffering, he tries to maintain a polite demeanor when begging.

Micky's Backstory: Micky was once a member of a raider gang that had taken over Springvale School. However, when a group of settlers fought back, Micky managed to escape during the chaos. He fled the area, terrified for his life, and made his way to Megaton by August 17th, 2277. Having lost all his supplies during his escape, he now desperately needs water to survive.
